# Heading 1 


## Quarto

### Heading 3

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>. My [hyperlink](https://quarto.org)

## Running Code

*When* you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

- Bullet point 1
- Bullet point 2

    - Subpoint 2


1. Numbered point 1
2. Numbered point 2

    2.1 Subpoint 1


```{r}
1 + 1
seq(1:10)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
1 + 1
seq(1:10)
```


```{stata}
dis 1 + 1
```
